transcript:
Hello?
Hellow?
Haa?
Ab Harshita ji baat kar rahe hain?
Haa.
Harshita ji baat kar rahi hu Niyamak head office se.
Hanji.
Hello.
Hello, hello.
Sir aapne call back call back haan ji, main call back kar diya thodi der mein.
Thik hai. To main ye ek baar call kijiye na sir concern open ho gaya aapke regarding aapne call kiya tha to ek baar discuss karke hum ise resolve kar lete hain.
Paanch minute mein call back kar diya aapko.
Please haan please aap call kijiye sir please aap aapne hi call kiya tha na wo incoming ki receive ho gaya tha. Thik hai, okay.
Okay.
Aap kijiye main wait kar rahi hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Request to call back in five minutes.

- Concern open regarding a previous call.



Resolution:

- Agreed to wait for a call back.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer will call back in five minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

callback, concern, resolve
